attributes.action: Repeal all Legislation That Started Life in Brussels since 1970
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Because the Queen broke her Coronation Oath of Allegiance when Britain signed up to Common Market, and the subsequent further 4 treaties, we submit that all legislation emanating from the EU is therefore illegal and has no legal standing in the United Kingdom and should be repealed accordingly.
